PropertyDef.Name: CoolingDesignAirFlow
PropertyDef.Definition: The air flowrate required during the peak cooling conditions.

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingDesignAirFlow
PropertyDef.Definition: The air flowrate required during the peak heating conditions, but could also be determined by minimum ventilation requirement or minimum air change requirements.

PropertyDef.Name: SensibleHeatGain
PropertyDef.Definition: The sensible heat or energy gained by the space during the peak conditions.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalHeatGain
PropertyDef.Definition: The total (sensible+latent) amount of heat or energy gained by the space at the time of the space's peak cooling conditions.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalHeatLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: The total amount of heat or energy lost by the space at the time of the space's peak heating conditions.

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingDryBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Dry bulb temperature, usually for for cooling design.

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingRelativeHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: Inside relative humidity for cooling design.

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingDryBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Dry bulb temperature for heating design.

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingRelativeHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: Inside relative humidity for heating design.

PropertyDef.Name: VentilationDesignAirFlow
PropertyDef.Definition: Ventilation outside air requirement for the space.

PropertyDef.Name: DesignAirFlow
PropertyDef.Definition: Design air flow rate for the space.

PropertyDef.Name: CeilingRAPlenum
PropertyDef.Definition: Ceiling plenum used for return air or not. TRUE = Yes, FALSE = No.

PropertyDef.Name: BoundaryAreaHeatLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: Heat loss per unit area for the boundary object. This is a design input value for use in the absence of calculated load data.
